articles.author: Clifford Coonan
articles.title: Hong Kong’s PCCW Media Teams With ‘Crazy Rich Asians’ Producer SK Global for Drama Series ‘The Season’ - Variety
articles.description: Hong Kong’s PCCW Media is linking up with SK Global Entertainment ('Crazy Rich Asians') to produce the drama series, 'The Season.'
articles.content:
Hong Kong’s PCCW Media is linking up with independent film and TV studio SK Global Entertainment (“Crazy Rich Asians”) to produce the drama series, “The Season.”
The six-part series is set in Hong K… [+2374 chars]
